CollectionPayload.description: NOTE: The following is from the Content monorepo

timestamp.description: Note this is not a timestamp... its a formatted date string..

IncomingBaseEvent.description: A base event that all events should extend from when they are Received only, not sent.

Scope.description: Identifies the fields which were searched.

search.description: Event triggered when SearchResults are returned from Pocket's search api (for saves and corpus). Entities included: api_user; sometimes user, feature_flag.

id.description: A unique ID for this result

result_count_total.description: Number of results in the result set.

result_urls.description: Ordered result of urls in the search result connection

returned_at.description: UNIX time in seconds when the results were sent by the Search API.

filter.description: Identifies the filters which were applied to the search, if applicable.

language.description: 2-5 character language code to indicate the language the search was performed in

scope.description: Identifies the fields which were searched.

search_type.description: Identifies the corpus that was searched

created_at.description: The timestamp in seconds when the item was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp in seconds when the item was last updated

created_at.description: The timestamp in seconds when the item was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp in seconds when the item was last updated
